Name: Super Rolling Heroes
About the game: Bounce and break everything while you roll downhill in this challenging yet accesible game! Push your skills to the limit as you destroy every object while maintaining momentum, exploding, bouncing, using power ups and avoiding all kinds of deadly obstacles. Simple yet highly-tuned gameplay with lots of levels, secrets and rewards to customize your hero. FEATURES - Online Leaderboards. - 5 'Rolling Hell': 'Rolling Hell' stages combine the levels of one world in a single run. Each 'Rolling Hell' has its own leaderboard. - Customize your hero with different expressions, clothes, costumes and accessories. - Learn how different objects react! - More than 50 challenging levels that increase in difficulty as the game progresses. - Amazing power ups and secrets!
